alert.note: Alert for Kosciusko; Noble; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 9:56PM EDT until July 26 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Noble County in northeastern Indiana... Northern Whitley County in northeastern Indiana... Northern Kosciusko County in north central Indiana... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 956 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Syracuse to near New Paris to near Nappanee, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Syracuse and Milford around 1000 PM EDT. North Webster around 1005 PM EDT. Warsaw around 1010 PM EDT. Winona Lake around 1020 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Big Barbee Lake, Ridinger Lake, Monoquet, Hoffman Lake, Leesburg, Atwood, Merriam, Lorane, Blue Lake, and Big Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
